subject: Order: SSN4743 - Missing stuff
description_text:
Hello,

I have order Pro X Ultra pedals with VAM Pro.
Order: SSN4743

I just received my package, butI dit not received the accessory kit of 
plate (heel plate / heighttening plate / base plate) so I cannot fix 
it...
How can we do ?

Thank you

Regards,

Alexandre

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexandre Urban,    It may be due to the base plate being out of stock. Once it arrives at our Germany warehouse, we can arrange to send you a replacement base plate.

I go the base plate, heel plate, heighttening plate, baseplate.
What is missing are the accesorry to fix the heel plate to the base plate.

Regards

________________________________
De : support@simsonn.com

Hi Alexandre Urban,    We sincerely apologize—it appears our warehouse may have shipped the wrong items. Could you please provide a photo showing all the products you received? We will look into this immediately.
Hi Alexandre Urban,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your replacement link.   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047211894902
